recentEntries.title: Holiday reflections
recentEntries.preview: Taking time to reflect on the year's achievements. We've grown from 2 to 8 team members, launched 3 major features...

recentEntries.title: Year-end planning
recentEntries.preview: Finalizing budget allocations for next year. Marketing needs more resources, but we also need to invest in engineering...
